subject: Memo, on July 16th you can discover a miraculous power, opening the door to all the health, wealth, and happiness you deserve
body:
Memo, on July 16th you can discover a miraculous power, opening the door to all the health, wealth, and happiness you deserve












   

Memo, your prayers can be answered and your life transformed.
Prepare to be touched by a miracle,beginning on July 16th.
Dear Memo,
    Now that Rochelle and I have been working on your forecast for over 3 months now, I feel that I have a unique understanding of you.
    That's why what I now have to say is so important to your future... Because I know your life is in for a terrific opportunity for transformation and that more doors are about to swing open for you than you ever thought possible. 
    Right now, you are at the precipice of something truly amazing and wonderful and I couldn't be more thrilled for you. Wealth, health and happiness are all within your grasp!
    That's because your very own miracle is waiting for you and can begin on July 16th, all because my good friend Dr. Rob has found something I know could make such an immense difference to your life. All you have to do is believe and put all the powers you can assemble to work for you, beginning with listening carefully to Dr. Rob's expert advice. 
    Dr. Rob is a professional clairvoyant, psychic and author with a huge following and a long history of A-one clients. He is someone who is beyond perceptive, as well as a possessor of great integrity, empathy and kindness. Indeed, he is also a respected minister.




    In various capacities, he has helped doctors, lawyers, airline pilots, celebrities and politicians. He has even worked repeatedly with the police force in Florida helping them to find missing loved ones and to recover lost or stolen treasures.
    And now I believe he can help you, too, Pierre, to find the LIFE that you want to be living.

 
Dear Memo, 
      I know that Bethea has been working with you and I also sense that you are due for a miracle. It is my honor to be the person who can help you find it.
      Dreams, YOUR dreams, are meant to come true. There is no dream or wish too big or too unlikely to happen. It is all within your grasp; the wealth you have wished for, the happiness you have prayed for, the love and luck you have always imagined for yourself. That's why you cannot afford to miss this chance! 
It is time for some good luck and I know whereand how to find it
      Memo, I know intuitively that you have felt real pain, sadness and disappointment. I know how hard it is to believe that things will ever change, that the sun will ever come out in your darkened, cloud-filled sky, that things will ever really turn around for you, but I am here to tell you that it can and will.
Leap over your barriers to wealth and happiness 
      The truth is, the very pain you have known may well be what blocks you from crossing over into the wealth, happiness and joy that you deserve. But it doesn't have to.
      That's why I feel I must tell you this amazing story about miracles.
How Lourdes' history can happily change your future
      Memo, you may well have already heard about Lourdes, a town in France, and of the events in the mid-19th century that have transformed it into one of the most important places of emotional, spiritual, and physical healing in the world.
      In 1858, a French peasant girl named Bernadette Soubirous, while going about her simple life, received the blessing of a vision of the Virgin Mary.
      However, where young Bernadette saw the beautiful woman in the grotto, her unbelieving neighbors could only see barren rock, the innocent child was able to see by the light of love and faith what was hidden in the darkness of others' minds.   What followed were an astonishing series of miracles, when the Holy Virgin could be seen as well as the miraculous creation of a limitless spring of water from an arid rock.
      But Bernadette’s worth was not valued. All around her were skeptics and non-believers. She was mocked and diminished and did not receive the seriousness she knew she deserved.
      Now tell me, Memo, is this a feeling that sounds sadly familiar?
July 16th was a miraculous and powerful date then and can be one for you NOW
        The date of July 16th was the eighteenth and last appearance of the Holy Virgin to Bernadette. This day, although her way to the grotto was blocked by a barrier, the call of the Virgin could not be denied.  Bernadette arrived at the grotto by way of the stream called Gave, her destination when she saw the first apparition.
Bernadette at last got what she needed and so can you!
      It was only after this date that Bernadette was finally empowered, respected and trusted. It was on this date that she received the validation of those around her.
      And when the Virgin Mary spoke to Bernadette, all doubts about her visions were then laid to rest.
      This new belief in herself went on to change her life and also to change the world.
      After this miracle, even more people flocked to the quiet town of Lourdes to witness and experience for themselves the prophesies, countless healing miracles, and life-altering transformations of this special place.
      For over 150 years, the name of the small town of Lourdes and its spring have been synonymous with miraculous healings.
Now the world-renowned healing spirit of Lourdes can come to you
      Memo, I can actually tell you how to bring the spirit of the Lourdes miracles right into your home and into your life and the lives of your loved ones, to help bring about astonishing changes, sensational opportunities and unforeseen joy!
      Now you can make this pilgrimage without leaving home. Because I have found for you your very own Miraculous Cross of Lourdes! 





      Extraordinary healing requires an extraordinary tool and this one is outstanding, Memo. 




      Made from gleaming, heavyweight sterling silver, the Miraculous Cross of Lourdes is a substantial, exquisitely crafted piece that is so spectacular-looking, you will want to wear and keep it with you at all times. And you will be proud to wear it not merely for its mystical powers, but also for its sheer beauty.
The rich symbolism of this magnificent Cross andhow it will work for you
      At the center of your Cross, Memo, is the relief of the head of a beautiful lady, who lies at the heart of the power of Lourdes, the Virgin Mary. The name LOURDES is carved and runs down the length of your Cross. The Cross also depicts 4 wild roses, symbolizing the yellow roses that sprung up at the top of the Virgin Mary's feet in that arid and barren place.



      This stunning piece even comes with its own 18-inch sterling silver chain so you can have it close to you at all times.
      The Miracles of Lourdes have journeyed to come and bless your life, turn it around and offer you the chance to remove spiritual and emotional blocks in the way of wealth, health and greater happiness.
      Here is your chance to be part of this amazing story, with this impressive, solidly-built Cross helping you to remove the emotional pain in your life.
To prove my commitment to you and to this Cross, I have 3 FREE gifts for you
      And what's more, when you take this critical step and reach out for the healing and inner peace the Cross can offer, because I can sense how much you deserve it and how much it can help you, I will now also send you:

      Your 1st FREE GIFT, a silver-plated Medallion of Lourdes, a handy and beautiful symbol of Lourdes with Bernadette on one side and the Virgin Mary with Bernadette at the scene of these miracles, on the other. This is a personal good luck talisman you will take great comfort and solace from.
      Your 2nd FREE GIFT, a red velvet, satin-lined presentation box, befitting the quality and stature of this truly majestic Cross.
      Your 3rd FREE GIFT, and as if this isn't enough, I will also send you a fascinating and comprehensive booklet that will tell you in greater detail about the Miracles of Lourdes and how you can incorporate them into your own life today.
      And the price for all this healing and help is even more miraculous because this is completely obligation-free: Just $6.95 now for shipping and handling and then you'll pay nothing for 30 days. That's right, the Cross is yours on a trial-basis. After 30 days, and only after 30 days, if you are completely happy with your Cross and feel it is living up to its promise, only then will you pay 4 easy installments of $14.95.
With my Unconditional Lifetime Moneyback Guarantee, you can rely on this 100% 
      Memo, I will guarantee you that this offer is without any obligation whatsoever of any kind. In fact, you assume none of the risk because the risk is all mine. Because if for any reason you are less than 100% delighted with your Miraculous Cross of Lourdes, simply send it back and I will refund your COMPLETE payment, every last penny, immediately, including shipping and handling. Without argument, problems or even any explanation necessary. But no matter what, you can keep the Medallion of Lourdes, the velvet satin-lined presentation box and the booklet as my FREE gifts to you always.
An exclusive opportunity for you!
      It is impossible to estimate the amount of healing that has occurred at Lourdes, but the true healing at Lourdes takes place in the emotional worlds of the people who tap into its power. And that can mean YOU! 
      Memo, simply confirm your invitation below now.
Imagine no more sleepless nights fretting about money
      Memo, your Miraculous Cross of Lourdes can give you what your heart truly desires. This is the peace that you have longed for in your life, peace and prosperity on every level.
      It is never too late to affect your OWN Miracles. But you must take the first step today.
      Your friend,            Dr. Rob 










If you no longer wish to receive any emails from me, you may click on the link below. But by doing this, Memo, it means that I will not be able to send you exclusive opportunities for discounts or important updates on astrological events and how they'll affect you. To follow good Internet etiquette, once you've asked to be deleted from one kind of email from me, I'm required to stop contacting you completely. So, Memo, if you wish to no longer receive any emails from me, simply click here or send a letter to me at 167 Cherry St. PMB 292, Milford, CT 06460-3400.
